developer: Turkiye Cumhuriyeti Cumhurbaskanlıgı Dijital Donusum Ofisi Baskanlıgı
description:
Yeni e-Devlet Kapısı iOS uygulaması ile www.turkiye.gov.tr adresindeki hizmetler artık mobil cihazınızda.
 
Uygulamayı kullanabilmek için e-Devlet Şifresi veya Mobil İmza sahibi olmalısınız. e-Devlet Şifrenizi PTT şubelerine geçerli kimliğiniz ile birlikte şahsen başvurarak temin edebilirsiniz. Mobil İmza aboneliği için hizmet aldığınız operatöre başvurmalı ve gerekli prosedürü tamamlamalısınız.

Uygulamayla, www.turkiye.gov.tr adresinde en sık kullanılan hizmetleri kullanabilir, favori hizmetlerinizi görebilir, profil bilgilerinizi düzenleyebilir, anlık bildirim alabilir, kamu kurumları ve belediyelere ait bilgi ve hizmetlere hızlı bir şekilde ulaşabilirsiniz.

 
En Sık Kullanılan Hizmetler

- SGK 4A Hizmet Dökümü
- Adalet Bakanlığı Mahkeme Dava Sorgulama
- Gelir İdaresi Başkanlığı Vergi Borcu Sorgulama
- SGK GSS Prim Borcu Sorgulama
- Maliye Bakanlığı e-Bordro Hizmeti

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing

• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos

• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly

• Microphone for speech translation

Translate text, voice, and photos in 320 different languages. Featuring a keyboard translator and live voice translator.

Whether you need to translate for travel, work, study, or everyday conversation, Translate Now is your ultimate AI-powered language translator. Break language barriers instantly with Translate Now’s multilingual translation tools, making every interaction seamless.

Key Features

▶ Hands-Free Voice Translator for Real-Time Conversations
Effortlessly overcome language barriers with a real-time, hands-free voice translator. Simply speak into your device for instant two-way translation and enjoy multilingual conversations with ease.
▶ Photo Translator for Instant Translation
Translate menus, signs, and pictures instantly with your camera. Just snap a photo for a real-time translation—perfect for travel and navigating world languages.
▶ Keyboard Translator for Multilingual Chat
Type in your native language and send translations live in 60 different languages within any app for effortless messaging.
▶ AI Translator for Instant Text Translation
Translate text with AI-enhanced accuracy, phonetic support, and context-aware translation in 320+ languages.
▶ AR Live Translator for an Immersive Local Experience
Use your camera and augmented reality to translate live, making language learning and travel more intuitive.
▶ AI-Powered Dictionary & Grammar Assistant
Expand your vocabulary with contextual meanings and receive real-time grammar corrections for more precise translations.

Translate Now offers various AI Translation Models, Phrasebook, Watch App, Translation Extension, Offline Mode, Dark Mode, Siri Shortcuts, Interactive Widgets, and SharePlay.

Türk Oftalmoloji Derneği olarak her yıl düzenlemekte olduğumuz TOD Ulusal Kongresi’nin 59.su bu yıl 19-23 Kasım 2025 tarihleri arasında Antalya Rixos Sungate Hotel ve Kongre Merkezinde gerçekleştirilecektir.

Bu mobil uygulama ile kongreye ait detaylara ulaşabilirsiniz.

Türk Dil Kurumunun 1945’ten beri yayımlanan Türkçe Sözlük’ünün 2023 yılında yapılan 12. baskısının mobil cihazlar için hazırlanan çevrimiçi ve çevrimdışı uygulama sürümüdür. Türkçe Sözlük dilimizde yaşanan gelişmelere bağlı olarak sürekli güncellenmektedir.

developer: MAIS MOTORLU ARACLAR IMAL VE SATIS ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Renault Port, the digital face of Renault presented to its customers. In short, our mobile application that provides an easy personalized experience.

So what is in this application?

You can make a service appointment by seeing the available times of authorized dealers.
The status of your vehicle in the service can be monitored and you can receive a notification when the service process of your vehicle is over.
You can start the purchasing process by seeing the vehicle stocks on the internet from the application.
You can track your Renault Finans loan and apply for a new loan.
You can follow the service history of your vehicle.
You can view information about your vehicle.
You can access Authorized Dealer / Service information.
You can contact Renault Diyalog on any subject and chat live.
You can access special offers and request a test drive.
You can store and manage documents like insurance, license, etc.
You can look at Renault's current models and news.
If you have more than one vehicle, you can add it and get a service appointment for each one separately.
You can look at the meaning of the lights on the instrument panel.
You can find frequently asked questions about Renault.
You can get the radio code and learn how to apply it to your vehicle.

That's all for now. We will continue to improve your Renault experience with future updates. You can send us your suggestions by giving feedback from within the application.

- Real-time camera translation: point your camera at text to instantly translate what you see
- Photo translation: translate text in taken or imported photos
- Dictation: translate what you speak out loud
- Text to speech: hear your translated text read out loud
- File translation: translate text from files
- Quick detection: translations begin as you type
- Alternative translations: explore different options for single words and short phrases
- Favorites: save words and phrases for future reference
- History: easily find, edit, and reuse past translations
- Transliteration: read translations of non-Latin languages, such as Japanese or Russian, in the Latin alphabet
- Glossary: translate key words and phrases as defined by you or your organization (available with a paid plan)
- Tone: choose a formal or informal tone (available with a paid plan)
- Handwriting: draw text characters instead of typing (available on iPad)
- DeepL Write: get intelligent writing suggestions to help you create clear, error-free, and impactful texts with ease


Feature support varies by language. Currently available: Acehnese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Aragonese, Armenian, Assamese, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Bashkir, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Bosnian, Breton, Bulgarian, Burmese, Cantonese, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese (simplified)*, Chinese (traditional)*, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dari, Dutch, English (American)*, English (British)*, Esperanto, Estonian, Finnish, French*, Galician, Georgian, German*, Greek, Guarani, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Indonesian, Irish, Italian*, Japanese*, Javanese, Kapampangan, Kazakh, Konkani, Korean*, Kurdish (Kurmanji), Kurdish (Sorani), Kyrgyz, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Lombard, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Maithili, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian (bokmål), Occitan, Pangasinan, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese*, Portuguese (Brazilian)*, Quechua, Romanian, Russian, Sanskrit, Serbian, Sicilian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish*, Spanish (Latin American), Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tsonga, Tswana, Turkish, Turkmen, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa
*Also available for DeepL Write

- Enjoy more translation features with a DeepL account
- Log in to your organization's team account via SSO

Turkey’s most high-toned Turkish – English online dictionary, Tureng is now extending its database to the iPhone and iPod Touch users. 

Having more than 3,000,000 English and Turkish words and phrases, classified into categories by the field of their usage, Tureng Dictionary, aiming to give the most accurate result in the fastest way, now provides the users with audial pronunciation option to hear the terms searched in the dictionary in three different accents, British, American and Australian. 

Our database is enhanced daily with the user suggestions and the additions primarily based on the “unfound” words, phrases and idioms translated by those who are experts in their fields, Tureng forum users (http://forum.tureng.com) and the Tureng translation team. Provided by Tureng Ltd, established with the collaboration of the translators with more than 10 year-translation experience, Tureng Dictionary, being determined to carry on its studies unfalteringly, is a free online lexical service specifically targeting to those working in translation, education, engineering, business world and foreign trade industries. 

Privacy Policy
https://tureng.com/en/privacy

Terms of Use
https://tureng.com/en/termsofuse

------------------------------- 

Türkiye'nin en kaliteli online Türkçe-İngilizce sözlüğü olan Tureng Sözlük, artık iPhone ve iPod Touch kullanıcılarına da hizmet verecek. 

En başarılı sonucu en hızlı şekilde verebilmeyi hedefleyen ve içeriğinde kullanım alanlarına göre kategorilendirilmiş 3 milyondan fazla terim barındıran Tureng Sözlük Uygulaması bu alanda da yine fark yarattı ve aranan kelimeyi, en çok bilinen 3 farklı İngilizce aksanda seslendirme özelliği ile kullanıcılarının hizmetine sundu. 

İçeriği sonuçsuz aramaların tercüme edilmesi ile geliştirilmekte olan veritabanımız, alanında uzman tercümanlar, forum (http://forum.tureng.com) üyelerimiz ve Tureng Sözlük Ekibi tarafından her gün geliştirilmektedir. Türkçe’ye çevrilmeyecek ifade kalmayana kadar çalışmalarına devam edecek olan Tureng Sözlük, 10 senelik çeviri geçmişine ve deneyimine sahip çevirmenler tarafından kurulmuş olan Tureng Çeviri firmasının, çeviri, eğitim, mühendislik, iş dünyası ve dış ticaret sektöründe çalışanlara sunduğu tamamen ücretsiz online sözlük hizmetidir.

Namaz: Salah Times is a simple prayer times app for Muslims worldwide.

It’s the best-favored and trusted Muslim app to check salah times daily.

We prioritize user safety and data privacy without login requirements.

Namaz offers adhan sounds for each salah time, salat reminders, custom alarms, a Quran and Dua player, a Hijri calendar with greeting cards, and a qibla finder.

Features:
- Either auto-location or manual city select for accurate salah times
- Adhan alarm sounds for the prayer times
- Custom reminders before the next prayer
- Widgets with a list of prayer times & a countdown to the next prayer time
- Live activity showing countdown on the lock screen
- Apple Watch app support with countdown and prayer times
- Monthly prayer times
- Qibla finder and compass
- Special dates with Hijri Calendar
- Daily ayat and hadith
- Greeting cards for family and friends
- Duas and Surahs
- Adhan sounds in different maqams from famous mosques
- Welcome text with a simple user interface
- Theme options for the home page
- Calculation methods for accurate prayer times worldwide
- Pro membership for removing ads and unlocking extra features

We're proudly developing the Namaz app and carefully read all reviews shared with us. Please share your experience on the Settings/Contact Us page. And so, we strive to make it better. Thank you for your feedback and support.


Powered by https://www.namaz.io

developer: BEKART TECH BILISIM TEKNOLOJI INSAAT TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
description:
Totally Free Muslim Prayer Times for cities all over the world with "Religious" & "Secured" prayer times.

One of the most downloaded programs of App Store, "Muslim Prayer Times" is now enhancing its capability with great feature additions. Version 3.0 of Muslim Prayer Times has the following changes:

- You can reach prayer times even without opening the app by lock screen widget.
- Quran Audio Player
- Qibla Finder
- Zikr (Dhikr) count in Zikr Counter is increased.
- Ready to send celebration messages for religious holy days, eids and special days are added.
- Qadha Counter (Missed prayer times counter) is added.
- You can follow all your prayer times by Salah Counter.
- Calendar for religious days is added.
- Sharing of verses from Quran option is added.
- Dictionary (Glossary) for islamic terms is added.
- Live broadcast from Kaaba, Mecca is added.
- Weekly Friday Khutbahs (sermons)
- Salah teacher
- Nearby Mosques
- Listening to different versions of our sacred Adhans
- Now everyone will have their special personal interface design wth dynamic interface design property.
- With educative islamic calendar, you can have different islamic stories and historic events every day.
- 3D mosque and Kaaba images are added.
- 81 islamic wallpapers are added to desing your app and phone interface with great wallpapers.

OUR APP HAS NO RELATIONSHIP WITH PRESIDENCY OF RELIGIOUS AFFAIRS TURKEY

developer: DIRECT CURSUS COMPUTER SYSTEMS TRADING LLC
description:
Yandex.Translate
Free translator that can work offline and translate text from photos

• Translate between any pair of the 100 languages when you’re online. 
• Translate from French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Turkish and other languages to English while offline: download these languages for free and enable the offline mode in Settings.
• Speak words or phrases in Russian, English, or Turkish to translate them into any of these languages, or have the app read the translations to you.
• Learn new words and their meanings through usage examples in the app’s dictionary (available for most of the currently supported languages).
• Take a picture of a menu, road sign, book page or choose a photo with text from your Camera Roll to view its translation right over the image (only available when you are online).
• Translate entire sites directly in the app or in Safari.
• Read books, news, or articles in a foreign language together with Yandex.Translate on your iPad using Split View. 
• Read transliterated Arabic, Armenian, Farsi, Georgian, Greek, Hebrew, Korean, Japanese, or Chinese Pinyin.
• Enjoy the app’s time-saving predictive typing function and automated language detection.
• Save translations in Favorites and view your translation history at any time.
• Speak to your Apple Watch to see your words translated on its screen.

Are you a coin collector looking to identify your latest find? Or maybe you stumbled upon a coin and want to know its value? Well, look no further! Introducing the new Coin Identifier - your one-stop-shop for all things coin-related. With just a snap of a picture, our app can identify your coin, provide detailed information about its history, estimate coin value, and even connect you with coin sellers and buyers. No more sifting through endless coin catalogs or scouring the internet for hours. Our app makes coin collecting easy, fun, and profitable. 

Key CoinIn features: 

Identify coins at lightning speed 
You won't have to spend hours searching through reference books or browsing the internet for visual confirmation.

Accurately identify over 270,000 coins 
Our large database contains more than 270 000 coins and allows you to identify any kind of coin. CoinIn scanner takes into account the type of material, time of creation, and coin condition, to provide you with the most precise and reliable information. 

Recognize rare, foreign, and error coins
Whether you're one of the seasoned coin collectors looking for a rare gem, or a newbie who’s just starting out, CoinIn has got you covered. 

Grade coins’ value, track prices in real time
Get an estimation of identified coins’ prices and an idea of the total value of your collection. CoinIn finder uses an API to provide you with a price tracker from numismatics platforms, so you know exactly how much your coins are worth. 

Follow coin collection trends 
Stay up to date with the coin collection series and be the first to add new gold and metal coins to your stock. 

Create a personalized online collection
Record, store, and access your collections right in the app anytime, anywhere. 

With CoinIn, you can turn your coin collection into a treasure trove - get started today!

About CoinIn Subscription:
- When you purchase CoinIn app subscription, the payment will be charged to your iTunes Account after confirmation. 
- The subscription will automatically renew, unless you turn off the auto-renew option at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. 
- The cost of renewal will be identified and charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. 
- If there is any unused portion of a free trial period offered, it will be forfeited upon purchasing a subscription to the publication. 
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by accessing your Account Settings after purchase. 

Ready to identify coins with ease? Get CoinIn today!


Please note that terms and conditions, as well as our privacy policy, apply.

Türkiye'de vatandaşlarla kurumlar arasında iletişimi sağlayarak dünyada örnek teşkil eden CİMER’in mobil uygulaması, T.C. Cumhurbaşkanlığı İletişim Başkanlığı’na bağlı CİMER (Cumhurbaşkanlığı İletişim Merkezi) tarafından sunulmaktadır. Bu uygulama, vatandaşların şikayet, talep, öneri ve bilgi edinme başvurularını hızlı ve kolay bir şekilde iletebilmelerine olanak tanır; ayrıca başvurularınızı yapabilir ve takibini gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.

Gizlilik politikası - https://www.iletisim.gov.tr/turkce/cimer-kvkk

With PlantAI, you will be able to satisfy your plant curiosity anywhere anytime within seconds. You will get detailed plant information like its name, characteristics, and toxicity. Moreover, this app offers you hands-on planting and growing tips like water, fertilize, mist, clean, and repot.

Try the most trending AI plant chatbot to explore a bigger world of plants today!

Namaz sureleri ve dualarını, namaz sureleri dışındaki diğer surelerden bazılarını, müezzinlikte okunan temel duaları vb. ezberlemek için yardımcı bir uygulama sunuyoruz. Ayrıca namazların kılınışını ana hatlarıyla öğrenebileceğiniz, basit bir simülasyon (benzetim) ile seçeceğiniz bir namazı baştan sona sesli ve görüntülü takip edebileceğiniz Namaz Hocası (Namaz nasıl kılınır?) bölümü bulunmaktadır.

Namaz kılmak isteyenler namaz simülatörü ile beş vakit namazı ve vitir namazını kılmayı öğrenebilirler. Bu bölümde zammı sureler şimdilik sabit olarak verilmektedir. Namazlar ile ilgili bilgilerde verildiği gibi namaz kılarken, farklı ayet ve sureler okunabilir.

Sure ve dua öğretici, ezberletici adını verdiğimiz uygulamamız ile seçeceğiniz bir sureyi ayet ayet, duaları da cümle cümle ve belirli aralıklarla tekrar eden şekilde dinleyebilirsiniz. Sesli olarak okunan ayetler ve dualar Arapça ve Latin harfleriyle (Türkçe) takip edilebilir. O anda okunan ayet veya dua cümlesi renkli olarak gösterilmektedir. Başlat düğmesine her dokunduğunuzda sure birinci ayetten tekrar başlayacaktır. 

Farklı hız seçenekleri ile okuma hızını dilediğiniz şekilde ayarlayabilirsiniz.

Her bir cümlenin kaç kere tekrar etmesini ve tekrarlar arasında kaç saniye beklemesini istiyorsanız, hemen o ekranda bunları ayarlayabilirsiniz. Sureyi veya duayı dinlemeye başladığınız anda bile tekrar sayısı ve bekleme zamanı ayarlarında değişiklik yapabilirsiniz. Dinlediğiniz ayeti (veya cümleyi) tekrar etmeniz için araya uygun bir bekleme zamanı ayarlamanızı tavsiye ederiz.

Sure veya duanın sadece belli bir yerini dinlemek isterseniz, istediğiniz satıra parmağınızın ucuyla dokunmanız yeterli. Hangi satıra dokunursanız uygulamamız o satıra geçecektir. Dilediğiniz cümleyi iyice öğrenene kadar tekrar edebileceksiniz.

Sureleri ve duaları tekrarsız bir şekilde dinlemek isterseniz tekrar sayısını ve bekleme süresini en az değere ayarlamanız yeterli olacaktır.

Metin boyutlarını değiştirmek isterseniz yine aynı ekranda gösterilen bölümde - ve + düğmelerini kullanabilirsiniz.

Ekranının sağ üst köşesindeki seçeceği işaretleyerek dua veya sureyi Ezberlendi olarak işaretleyebilirsiniz.

İnşallah uygulamamızın bir miktar da olsa faydalı olmasını ümit ediyoruz.

Temel müezzinlik bilgisi düzeyinde bazı ayet ve dualar yer almaktadır.

Uygulamamız ile ayet ve duaları cümle cümle görüp, okuyup, dinleyip, otomatik tekrarlarla öğrenebileceğinizi umuyoruz. Ezan dinlemek için bile kullanabilirsiniz.

Besmele, ayet olarak sadece Fatiha Suresinde seslendirilmiştir. Ios ortamındaki fontlardan dolayı şeddeli kullanımlarda esre harfin değil şeddenin altında gösterilebilmektedir.

Uygulamızın amacı sure ve duaları ayet ayet  ve cümle cümle ezberlemenize yardımcı olmak olduğu için, bazı sure ve dualarda genel okuma kurallarından farklı bir okuma şekliyle karşılaşabilirsiniz. Mesela iki ayetin birleşik okunabildiği Kadr Suresinde ...emrin selam... yerine, ayetin bitim yerindeki ..emr. kelimesinde durulmuş, daha sonra diğer ayete geçilmiştir. Tek ayetten oluşan bazı uzun bölümler, ezber kolaylığı olması açısından bölümlere ayrılmıştır.

Uygulamamız için sure ve duaları özel olarak okuyup bize gönderen Nuri Akar Hocamıza çok teşekkür ediyoruz. Allah ondan ve sizlerden razı olsun.

description:
e-Devlet Anahtar uygulaması, e-Devlet Kapısı’na T.C. Kimlik Numarası ve şifre ile giriş sonrasında fazladan tek kullanımlık şifre güvenliği getirmektedir. www.turkiye.gov.tr’de bulunan e-Devlet Anahtar menüsünden anahtarınızı aktif hale getirebilir, sonrasında bu uygulamayı kullanarak tek kullanımlık şifreler üretebilirsiniz.

e-Devlet Anahtar uygulamasının ürettiği şifre, e-Devlet Kapısı’na giriş için tek başına yeterli değildir. Giriş yapabilmek için mutlaka T.C. Kimlik Numarası ve şifre ile giriş yapılmalıdır. e-Devlet Anahtar, ek bir güvenlik yöntemidir. Ayrıca, e-Devlet Anahtar özelliği aktif edildikten sonra e-Devlet mobil uygulamaları ile giriş yapabilmek için, mobil uygulamanın son versiyonunun cihazınızda yüklü olması gerekmektedir.

Welcome to the world of simplified crafting: YarnPal is the app that brings your knitting and crochet skills to life in no time. Simply snap a photo, follow step-by-step instructions, and create personalised projects—anytime, anywhere.

YarnPal is your daily companion for knitting and crochet, giving you easy access to tutorials, patterns, and design inspiration. Try it now with our free trial and unlock a world of stitches, motifs, and creative possibilities—perfect for both beginners and experienced makers!

What Can YarnPal Do?
1. Snap a Photo, Learn a Stitch
Seen a stitch you love? Take a photo, and YarnPal will tell you its name and show you how to do it. Picking up new stitches is quick and easy!
2. Step-by-Step Pattern Help
Stuck on a pattern? Upload it to YarnPal. The app will break it down for you and help you keep track of your place as you work through each row. You can even adjust the pace to suit your needs.
3. Creative AI Tools
Get Pattern Ideas: Lacking inspiration? Let YarnPal’s AI suggest new patterns for scarves, shawls, and other creative projects.
Fix Mistakes: Made an error? YarnPal can spot and help you fix it.
Understand Charts and Symbols: Struggling with pattern charts? YarnPal explains the symbols so you can follow along with confidence.
4. Ask the AI Coach
Have a question about knitting or crochet? Ask the AI Coach anything! From basic stitches to advanced techniques, get instant answers and helpful advice.
5. Personalise Your Projects
Want to make something unique? Adjust sizes, styles, and patterns to match your ideas. YarnPal helps you create truly one-of-a-kind pieces.

Who Is YarnPal For?
1. Beginners
New to knitting or crochet? YarnPal makes learning simple, with clear steps and helpful tips to get you started with confidence.
2. Hobbyists
Already enjoy knitting or crochet? Use YarnPal to try out new tools, tackle tricky patterns, and customise your projects. Take your craft to the next level!
3. Experts
Even for advanced crafters, YarnPal saves you time and sparks fresh ideas. Design better patterns, fix issues efficiently, and stay motivated.

Why Use YarnPal?
With YarnPal, crafting is:
Easy: Learn stitches and patterns stress-free.
Fun: Get creative and try something new.
Organised: Easily keep track of projects and progress.

Join the YarnPal Community
Connect with knitters and crocheters from around the world to share ideas, showcase your work, and get inspired. With YarnPal, you’ll never craft alone.

Start Your YarnPal Journey Today!
Download YarnPal now and see what you can create. Whether it’s your first simple scarf or an intricate piece of your own design, YarnPal will guide you every step of the way. Let’s make something amazing together!

Voice translation was never so easy! Travel around the world and easily communicate in any country – Voice Translator will instantly pronounce translated phrases on-the-fly! Can’t read the menu items in a fancy foreign restaurant? Those days are history now with instant camera translation!

Communicate freely at the airport, hotel, gas station, supermarket or any other place. Read street signs in a foreign country, translate manuals of your overseas purchases or the text of any picture you already have in your phone. Just put your personal interpreter into a pocket and use it for your all translating needs!

Voice Translator is an essential learning tool for kids and adults – learn new phrases and listen to the correct pronunciation.

Start using Voice Translator now and forget about looking for the correct phrase in the dictionary – say any phrase and your interpreter will pronounce the translation out loud!

Features:
– Immediate translation of real-time conversations
– Use your camera for instant text translation
– Translate texts from your photos and pics
– Translate as you type in any of your favorite messaging apps
– Extended offline phrasebook
– Language detection for text-to-text mode
– 100+ languages working in speech-to-speech and text-to-text modes
– You can either speak or type to translate your text
– Smart text-to-text mode
– Speed up your text input with typing hints
– Convert text from languages with non-Latin alphabet
– Copy, paste and share translations in a single tap
– Intuitive dialogue conversation interface
– Speak the translated phrase out loud
– Control the speed of voice
– Male and female voices available
– Human-to-Pet and Pet-to-Human modes (for entertainment purposes only). Translate your pet’s meow or woof into your language.

Translator is your multi-language communication tool, supporting translation between 100+ languages, allowing you to communicate easily in every corner of the world. It not only provides standard text translation, but also provides a variety of powerful functions to meet various language needs.

Feature Highlights:
1. Text translation: Easily realize text translation between languages through keyboard input. No outside help required, everything is under control.
2. Real-time conversation translation: Multi-language conversation is no longer an obstacle. It can instantly translate the words between you and your conversation partner, enabling barrier-free communication.
3. Voice input: If you don’t want to enter text, you can use the voice function to write characters directly on the screen, and they will be translated into text.

Travel: Whether it is a restaurant menu, traffic signs, or interactions with locals, the translation app can help you quickly understand.
Business: When communicating with multinational companies and customers, the translation app allows you to easily handle emails, documents, and calls in various languages.
Learning: A must-have for partners learning new languages, translate words, phrases, and sentences anytime, anywhere to accelerate the language learning process.
Daily life: Translate shopping tags, recipes, news, etc. to help you better understand content in different languages.

Why choose us?
High accuracy: Using advanced translation algorithms to ensure accurate translation results.
User-friendly: The simple interface design makes it easy for you to get started and quickly find the functions you need.
Fast and efficient translation experience, easily cope with various scenarios such as daily conversations, business emails, travel routes, etc.

Let communication without borders, experience seamless global communication. Download the Translate Ease app now and make every communication simple and hassle-free!
